member.name: M:Wd3eCore.Mvc.Utilities.ControllerExtensions.ChallengeOrForbid(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Controller)
member.summary: Returns the proper actionresult for unauthorized or unauthenticated users. Will return a forbid when the user is authenticated. Will return a challenge when the user is not authenticated.
member.returns: The proper actionresult based upon if the user is authenticated

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApplicationModels.PageConventionCollectionExtensions.AddAreaFolderRoute(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApplicationModels.PageConventionCollection,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a folder route for all pages in the specified area and under the specified area folder. These pages can be routed via their names prefixed by folder route in addition to the default set of path based routes. Links generated for these pages will use the specified folder route. Note: Applied to all pages whose razor view file path doesn't contain any '/Admin/' segment and whose route model properties doesn't contains an 'Admin' key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApplicationModels.PageConventionCollectionExtensions.AddAdminAreaFolderRoute(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApplicationModels.PageConventionCollection,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a folder route for all pages in the specified area and under the specified area folder. These pages can be routed via their names prefixed by folder route in addition to the default set of path based routes. Links generated for these pages will use the specified folder route. Note: Applied to all pages whose razor view file path contains an '/Admin/' segment or whose route model properties contains an 'Admin' key.
